content: http //www ravelry com/stores/cathy-ren-designs and http //www craftsy com/user/919070/pattern-store welcome to visit my shops at http //www etsy com/shop/cathyren crochet pattern cat hats us term abbreviations chain = chain st= stitch stitches single_crochet= single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch ea = each repeat = repeat round = round material worsted yarn i used red heart super saver for the samples us h8/5 0mm or any hook to obtain the gauge gauge 13 sts and 7 5 row/4 10cm with double_crochet stitches color a main color 100-150 yards for one color hat skill level circumference this pattern includes 5 sizes hat approx baby- toddler pattern stitch numbers are color-coded young child 16 / 46 cm fits head 16 -18 child - teen 17 / 44 cm fits head 17-19 teen - adult 18 5 /47 cm fits head 19-20 5 adult large 19 5 / 49cm fits head 20-22 21 /53cm fits head 22-23 if you use dk yarn hook us 7 / 4 5mm it ll be about one size smaller comparing worsted yarn with same stitches if you use bulk yarn hook us i9 / 5 5mm it ll be about one size bigger comparing worsted yarn with same stitch cathyren© you may not rewrite resell or trade this pattern no mass production allowed page 1 pattern tip you can work more double_crochet rounds to make hat taller if you like note all chain-1 s/chain-2 s at beg are counted as st and slip_stitch s are not i highlight the repeat part to make it easy to find which sts to repeat color a or a different color if you work two-color hat 52 56 60 64 68 chain join with beg chain to shaping ears make a circle round 1 round 12 13 14 15 16 single_crochet 5 5 5 6 chain 1 single_crochet around join with beg chain 1 6 half_double_crochet 4 5 5 5 6 double_crochet 8 8 10 10 10 chain 1 round 2-3 half_double_crochet 4 5 5 5 6 single_crochet 5 5 5 6 6 * chain 2 count as fpdc *bpdc next 52 56 60 64 repeat *-* 52 56 60 64 68 fpdc next* repeat *-* around join with beg 68 around join with beg chain 1 chain 2 tutorial video for fpdc and bpdc round 13 14 15 16 17 5 6 6 6 5 5 6 6 8 8 8 10 http //youtu be/534ptp9fd2w chain 1 *single_crochet 5 5 5 6 6 5 6 6 6 half_double_crochet 5 double_crochet 6 52 56 60 64 half_double_crochet 5 single_crochet 5 * repeat *-* ribs 68 around join with beg chain 1 round 14 15 16 17 18 6 6 7 8 5 6 6 6 5 6 6 chain 1 *single_crochet 5 change color from round 5 if you work two- 6 6 6 7 8 half_double_crochet 5 double_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 5 color hat 52 56 60 64 68 round 4 - 11 12 13 14 15 single_crochet
